title: Smart Data Models - EquivalentBranch
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents equivalent branches.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be EquivalentBranch

negativeR12.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Negative sequence series resistance from terminal sequence  1 to terminal sequence 2. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 EquivalentBranch is a result of network reduction prior to the data exchange Default: 0.0

negativeR21.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Negative sequence series resistance from terminal sequence 2 to terminal sequence 1. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 EquivalentBranch is a result of network reduction prior to the data exchange Default: 0.0

negativeX12.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Negative sequence series reactance from terminal sequence  1 to terminal sequence 2. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Usage : EquivalentBranch is a result of network reduction prior to the data exchange Default: 0.0

negativeX21.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Negative sequence series reactance from terminal sequence 2 to terminal sequence 1. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909. Usage: EquivalentBranch is a result of network reduction prior to the data exchange Default: 0.0

positiveR12.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Positive sequence series resistance from terminal sequence  1 to terminal sequence 2 . Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909.  EquivalentBranch is a result of network reduction prior to the data exchange. Default: 0.0

positiveR21.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Positive sequence series resistance from terminal sequence 2 to terminal sequence 1. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 EquivalentBranch is a result of network reduction prior to the data exchange Default: 0.0

positiveX12.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Positive sequence series reactance from terminal sequence  1 to terminal sequence 2. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Usage : EquivalentBranch is a result of network reduction prior to the data exchange Default: 0.0

positiveX21.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Positive sequence series reactance from terminal sequence 2 to terminal sequence 1. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Usage : EquivalentBranch is a result of network reduction prior to the data exchange Default: 0.0

r.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Positive sequence series resistance of the reduced branch. Default: 0.0

r21.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Resistance from terminal sequence 2 to terminal sequence 1 .Used for steady state power flow. This attribute is optional and represent unbalanced network such as off-nominal phase shifter. If only EquivalentBranch.r is given, then EquivalentBranch.r21 is assumed equal to EquivalentBranch.r. Usage rule : EquivalentBranch is a result of network reduction prior to the data exchange. Default: 0.0

x.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Positive sequence series reactance of the reduced branch. Default: 0.0

x21.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reactance from terminal sequence 2 to terminal sequence 1 .Used for steady state power flow. This attribute is optional and represent unbalanced network such as off-nominal phase shifter. If only EquivalentBranch.x is given, then EquivalentBranch.x21 is assumed equal to EquivalentBranch.x. Usage rule : EquivalentBranch is a result of network reduction prior to the data exchange. Default: 0.0

zeroR12.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Zero sequence series resistance from terminal sequence  1 to terminal sequence 2. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 EquivalentBranch is a result of network reduction prior to the data exchange Default: 0.0

zeroR21.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Zero sequence series resistance from terminal sequence  2 to terminal sequence 1. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Usage : EquivalentBranch is a result of network reduction prior to the data exchange Default: 0.0

zeroX12.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Zero sequence series reactance from terminal sequence  1 to terminal sequence 2. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Usage : EquivalentBranch is a result of network reduction prior to the data exchange Default: 0.0

zeroX21.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Zero sequence series reactance from terminal sequence 2 to terminal sequence 1. Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Usage : EquivalentBranch is a result of network reduction prior to the data exchange Default: 0.0
